channel.title: Sarah (-SCOTTY-) is getting drove to hospital
channel.description:
Sarah was in a crash like 3 mins ago :eek: she being rushed to hospital.
Please pay respect.. :( :( :mad: :( :mad: Bloofy volvo drivers
*for got to log out im ScotaloticaS

item.title: Sarah (-SCOTTY-) is getting drove to hospital
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

[quote=“ScotaloticaS, post:114, topic:14176”][quote author=wixter link=topic=21184.msg244100#msg244100 date=1158354250]

Lol my sis it was a good night plus she was hungry!

Yeh. Thats not strange at all… + dont you have food at your house?
[/quote]
She wanted a burger…

…The forums are fucked up im gone[/quote]
Im guessing she had the munchies?

@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

omfg… look at my post! obviously he should care about his sister enough to respond I mean seriously! if your sister was injured very badly went into a coma for 6 hours… (highly doubt it) and lost her memory? why the fuck would you be on here posting about graphics!

item.source: Sarah (-SCOTTY-) is getting drove to hospital

item.title: Sarah (-SCOTTY-) is getting drove to hospital
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“anon95490785, post:8, topic:14439”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=21184.msg245594#msg245594 date=1158391133]

Yeah… Umm…

This is coatbridge’s brother!!!11

I just want to inform you that coatbridge died last night in a large fire. her last words was to tell you guys of the incident.

See what I mean? No evidence, and the story seems very unbelievable. And because of that everyone knows it’s fake. Not remembering your parents but remembering forum people and passwords is just a huge pile of bullshit.

But we know that’s fake becuase you’re an asshole.
[/quote]

Yes I can be an asshole, but this is the internet, too many people try to pretend they died or got injured. So unless they got proof I am not gonna believe it for a second. Still, anyone can call me an asshole I don’t care, but all I’m saying is that I am not believing this story whether anyone likes it or not.[/quote]
Everybody has their own opinion on things. I guess i sort of believe it because if it is true, i feel sorry for Scotty. But some of the things do sound a little sus.

Especially the Mum and Dad post… ;\

Read full topic

I’m not saying i believe this, but there is a possibility.

therealjdb:

Man you people that say this isnt real without proof you should just keep your mouths shut. and even if theres a probable cause for it not to be real who cares? I don’t know about you but if she did get in an accident or atleast posted that she did then im going to say something nice. you know better safe then sorry. If you don’t think this is real then don’t post here, it’s that simple.

I died of aids yesterday.

item.title: Sarah (-SCOTTY-) is getting drove to hospital
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

[quote=“irfan786, post:104, topic:14176”][quote author=coatbridge link=topic=21184.msg244994#msg244994 date=1158378826]

So what? who go’s for a drive at 1:27AM!?!..(or whatever) go cry for attention somewere else KTHX

Wtf, who DOESN’T go driving at 1.27 AM? That’s quite normal.

Not sure weither you were trying to be sarcastic there or not…but seriously, who ‘Go’s for a drive’ at half 1 in the morning lawl…

Parties, boredom(go to a fast food place or something), hot boxing while driving the long country roads, mud runs(We race our cars in a forest path full of mud and stuff, it’s a lot of fun but scarey sometimes).

You need to get out of your house more often.
[/quote]

www.Wixter.justgotowned.com[/quote]
Lol saw what?
